Hello everyone

I'm currently trying to design my own satallite, but i have some issue in constructing the panels, and cant find a way around it.

searching around didnt found me an answer.

Basically, i'm making a cubus. using the 1x1 panel at the top, and then 4 side symmetric octagonal cubic struts. That all works out just fine

However, when i want to close it up with 4 vertical panels, i cant get them to allign decently.

Am i missign something ?

as you can see, i try to close the construction, but this is the furthest i get. Beyond that the panels start splitting inside, and changing angles and stuff
Use 4 symmetry, use the top plate as attachment point, rotate down with S key (or whatever else if you've changed your keybinds).
